reviews.review_msg: Best prof I have ever had. Tiffany cares about her students success and learning. Engaging lectures and discussions. If you have the chance to take a class with her do it. Every prof at SFU should be like her.

Loved Dr. Muller Myrdahl! Gives wonderful feedback, is extremely caring, and always shows up to lectures with a ton of energy and humour! I would absolutely take a course with her again without question as I was able to apply her meaningful feedback to other courses. She was wonderful.

One of the best profs I have had, she made online learning feel not so boring, with engaging lectures, discussions and assignments. I will definitely be taking more of her classes in the future! Tiffany is an extremely caring and understanding prof who cares about her students.

She is super sweet. If you're interested in GSWS OR geography, I recommend this class! You don't need to be knowledgable, just willing to learn. Her projects are super unique, and very personal. She makes online school feel less isolating although beware of weekly discussion posts, interactive tutorials, and breakout rooms if you hate those things.

Tiffany is one of my favourite profs ever! She is incredibly helpful, kind, and gives you many chances to succeed. She is lenient with due dates and gives great feedback on assignments, she is truly a gem!

Overall, Tiffany knew the course content and was clearly knowledgeable and passionate. Yeah, she isn't the most concise speaker, but if you are confused she will happily take the time to work with you, you just have to ask. They were also VERY compassionate and worked with me to grant multiple extensions. Do the readings and care about the topics!

I've had Tiffany as my professor three times now (204, 319, 350) for a reason. She actively engages her students and encourages feedback. She gets the class talking as a group. As well, she is a super fair marker and gives lots of time to ask for questions. She cares about her students and wants everyone to do well. Definitely would recommend.
lectures can be a bit painful at times, but overall she is a great prof.
Great prof. Super caring.
Tiffany is a great professor. She really cares about students and want to make school fun and interesting. We had many field trips and It was nice not always being in a classroom. It was awesome!
great prof. take a course with her if ever get the chance to

Terrible lecturer. Said "um" every 3 words making her very difficult to understand. Also used a lot of words to say very little. Her poor presentation skills made the course content very boring. Criteria for assignments were vague and there was minimal information given about exams.
Terrible lecturer. Unable to explain a concept properly without pausing for mins and saying 'uhh.' Easy course just recommend with a different prof who can actually lecture

If you are considering this as an elective, DON'T!!! Avoid at all cost! Lectures are NOT informative and seems to be all over the place. Hard to understand important points with her lecture style. This course was supposed to be interesting social issues, but it turned out boring.

Lectures were really boring, seems as if she just kept rambling on and on to point where you would forget what she was talking about. Plus, she wasn't that great at explaining some course concepts during lecture. Slides for lectures were okay, but could have been more informative. It was nice having a few options for the paper topics though.

This class made me abandon feminism, easy course material, but the readings makes a drill to the eye seem desirable. Assignments are worth nothing, and are so mind numbing that I became physically ill.

Probably the worst prof I've ever had. Her lectures are terrible, she cannot go five seconds without saying um, ah, or looking up at the ceiling. Everything she says, and writes, contains so many useless words, and yet still manages to say so little. If you want an easy class that will make you hate your life her classes are for you.

T is the most incredible prof I've ever had, always wish I could get more out of her. so caring and goes the extra mile for students. participate in lectures and take a genuine interest to the subject matter, and she will recognize your effort. a little disorganized, but compassionate to students who also are.
Amazing Professor! She is super understanding, fair marker, easy going. She is very passionate and keeps all her lectures fun and engaging. (GSWS 204 & GSWS 319)

Tiffany is a gem. She challenges students as well as the underlying system of academia - so rare and refreshing. She always tends to over assign at the beginning of term but if more than one person (respectfully) expresses concern she WILL listen and adjust. Highly recommend her class for a challenge and fresh perspective.

An extremely challenging course, but in the very best way. Don't take a class with her as a GPA boost or "just cuz it's available" because you gotta WERK. But it's all worth it, I learned so much, and T is totally rad.
